channel.title: Counting active redash users?
channel.description:
### Issue Summary We are trying to keep a count of active users within our organization to see who uses Redash.
We found this PR https://github.com/getredash/redash/pull/1214 and it seems like the PR was closed with no action taken because analytics won't track page changes. In our case, we don't care about tracking page changes. We care about counting active users the first time they use Redash in a session.
How should we be setting up Google analytics to track Redash usage? Any ideas/thoughts would be greatly appreciated.
### Technical details: * Redash Version: 9

item.title: Counting active redash users?
item.dc:creator: prakash
item.description:
Issue Summary

We are trying to keep a count of active users within our organization to see who uses Redash.

We found this PR https://github.com/getredash/redash/pull/1214 and it seems like the PR was closed with no action taken because analytics won’t track page changes.
In our case, we don’t care about tracking page changes. We care about counting active users the first time they use Redash in a session.

How should we be setting up Google analytics to track Redash usage? Any ideas/thoughts would be greatly appreciated.

Technical details:

  • Redash Version: 9

Read full topic
